name: Number Waterfall - Add Games
description:
Simulate a waterfall using numbers. Waterfall is considered well-formed only if:
- Sum of the numbers is equal to the goal.
- Marked numbers should be adjacent horizontal, vertical & diagonally. That is, no empty line union.
- 2 numbers marked on each row.

Also available a challenges section, where different variations appear. In both cases, there are two levels: normal & difficult. In the normal level, the sum is shown, however, in the difficult level, you will have to add & subtract mentally because it disappears.

Challenges:
- 15s & 30s countdown
- 6 hidden cells
- Random, Negative, Pair & Odd numbers
- Multiples of 10

Add & Subtract. Brain challenges game.

For Apple Watch, reduced version.
